name: who-has-request
description: Represents a BACnet Who-Has request, used to discover devices that contain a specific object by identifier or name, optionally within a device instance range.

fields.name: limits
device-instance-range-low-limit
fields.description: The lower limit of the device instance range.

fields.name: device-instance-range-high-limit
fields.description: The upper limit of the device instance range.
Optional range of device instance numbers to limit the search.

fields.name: object

options.name: object-identifier
options.description: The object identifier to search for.

options.name: object-name
options.description: The object name to search for.

fields.description: The object to search for, specified by identifier or name.
